column1: Topic title: Is KL salary comparable to SG in term of local PPP

column8: I know salary in SG higher. But comparing apple and oranji, are KLnites and Kiasunites having the same local domestic purchasing power parity? Meaning earn here spend here basis.
No. Even dollar to dollar no.You compare big mac and phones prices enough. Big difference is purchasing power.

2016 GDP per capita in nominal terms, by IMF and Malaysian Statistics Department: Kuala Lumpur   :USD23kSingapore        : USD 53k2016 GDP (PPP) per capitaKuala Lumpur : USD 67k (based on Malaysian average: no official estimates)Singapore       : USD 90k (by IMF)So, Kuala Lumpur is still 6 years behind Singapore in terms of GDP PPP capita.
